name: Quickbill
desc: Quickbill is a streamlined subscription payment platform designed for local businesses to manage recurring payments for utilities like water and electricity. The app integrates seamlessly with local payment providers, offering a user-friendly interface and efficient payment processes. Quickbill aims to simplify billing management while enhancing convenience for both businesses and their customers

name: Relicense
desc: Relicense is a simplified licensing platform designed to streamline and manage the licensing process. With a highly customizable and easy-to-scale architecture, License Request empowers institution or organization to efficiently manage licenses according to user unique requirements.

name: Bricks
desc: Bricks app is the agile collaborative app designed specifically for the Architecture, Engineering, and Construction industry. It helps AEC teams to collaborate more efficiently thanks to BIM collaboration and Agile methods. What makes Bricks different from other project management app is its integration with BIM360, IFC model file, BCF, and other BIM integrations.
